description: Extract and merge i18n target options for Build Facade.

buildTarget.description: A browser builder target to extract i18n messages in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`.

format.description: Output format for the generated file.

outputPath.description: Path where output will be placed.

outFile.description: Name of the file to output.

i18nBuilder.description: The i18n builder to execute before merge. Supports both @angular/build:extract-i18n and @angular-devkit/build-angular:extract-i18n. Auto-detects if not specified.
